name: Daughter of Forkos
description:
The legends we know are usually told from the perspective of a hero. What if it's the wrong way around? Play as Medusa and petrify these dumb wanna-be heroes. Sell stone 'sculptures' for profit. And try not to get stuck when they pile up!

Created by:

Łukasz Winkler "Winxorz"

Helena Kot "Kit"

Karolina Górska "Chomik"

Jacek Kozieja "Asterix"
